results.overview: After the Civil War, Confederate soldier Blayde Hollister travels to Dallas to avenge the savage murder of his family. Discovering his enemy is now an esteemed citizen, Hollister plots to expose the outlaw and his syndicate.
results.title: Dallas

results.overview: Dallas is a director forced to make a film to get out of a bad financial situation, he associates with a rich businessman who is a passionate film cinephile. During the shooting, the main actor dies.  A crazy adventure full of twists and turns and humor ensues.
results.title: Dallas

results.overview: Loosely based on the true-life tale of Ron Woodroof, a drug-taking, women-loving, homophobic man who in 1986 was diagnosed with HIV/AIDS and given thirty days to live.
results.title: Dallas Buyers Club

results.overview: Clay Stone defends a lawless town from a gang of outlaws after s stagecoach robbery.
results.title: Damned Pistols of Dallas

results.original_title: Yerli Dallas 2 Kadin Daha çok Sever
results.title: Native Dallas 2: Woman Loves More

results.overview: Assassins led by Black Widow are out to kill Antonio Morales to prevent him from handing a computer chip over to IWAR headquarters. It's up to secret agents Chris Cannon, Mark Austin, and Samantha Maxx to stop them
results.title: The Dallas Connection

results.original_title: Il mio nome è Scopone e faccio sempre cappotto
results.overview: Dallas tries to regain his father's farm which he lost in a card game with Kelly. But Kelly is now dead and his daughter, Glenda, doesn't know how to play poker. There are also rumors of a hidden treasure.
results.title: Dallas

results.overview: After divorcing a society man, a small-town woman tries to build a better life for their daughter.
results.title: Stella Dallas

results.overview: NXT TakeOver: Dallas was a major professional wrestling show in the NXT TakeOver series that took place on April 1, 2016, produced by WWE, showcasing its NXT developmental brand, and was streamed live on the WWE Network. It took place at the Kay Bailey Hutchison Convention Center in Dallas, Texas, during the weekend of WrestleMania 32. It was the first show in the NXT TakeOver series to be broadcast live on the WWE Network during WrestleMania weekend and first of 2016.
results.title: NXT TakeOver: Dallas

results.overview: American cities, unlike, say, European ones, cannot boast of a history of the past two millennia. There are no old palace fences, no deep antiquity.., but even in this row, Dallas, spread out on the Texas prairies, is considered a newcomer in America - an upstart without family and tribe.
results.title: America of the seventies. Dallas Mysteries

results.overview: A semi-fictional account of life as a professional football player. Loosely based on the Dallas Cowboys team of the early 1970s.
results.title: North Dallas Forty

results.overview: Rusty (Shawn Hatosy) has been bailed out of bad situations more than once by his understanding but distraught mother, Mary (Kelly Lynch). When Mary starts dating a psychologist, Bob (Jeff Goldblum), Rusty connects with the man and begins talking to him about his problems. As Rusty benefits from the therapy sessions, his best friend, Dallas (Scott Caan), still very involved in illegal and dangerous activities, takes issue with Rusty going straight and cleaning up his life.
results.title: Dallas 362

results.original_title: The Making of the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: 2004 Swimsuit Calendar
results.overview: Often imitated, never duplicated.  The world famous Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders. 21 of the most gorgeous cheerleaders in the world spend 7 grueling days in paradise to be photographed for an exclusive spot in the 2004 Swimsuit Calendar.  From sunrise to sunset, day after day, photo shoots are documented from both sides of the lens.  Crews battle the elements as the cheerleaders are captured on film in some of the most remote locations on the island of Cozumel. Not only witness the overwhelming beauty of the girls and the scenery, but what it truly takes out of dozens of people to bring such an exclusive calendar from concept to page.
results.title: The Making of the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: 2004 Swimsuit Calendar

results.overview: To salvage his job and the circulation of his magazine, an editor decides to publish an expose revealing the inside story of the famed cheerleading squad and plants his reporter/girlfriend among the girls.
results.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders

results.original_title: Metallica: Live in Dallas, Texas - August 3, 2000
results.overview: Filmed during the second of two free makeup shows at Starplex Amphitheater in Dallas, TX on August 3, 2000. **Please note that there is very little crowd noise picked up by the stage mics and there was no known audience recording to mix in.**
results.title: Metallica: Live in Dallas, Texas - August 3, 2000

results.original_title: Daughters of the Sexual Revolution: The Untold Story of the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders
results.overview: Daughters of the Sexual Revolution is the never-before-told story of Suzanne Mitchell, the fiercely-loyal den mother of the original Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders.
results.title: Daughters of the Sexual Revolution: The Untold Story of the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders

results.original_title: All Star Comedy Jam: Live from Dallas
results.overview: Academy Award winner and one of the Original Queens of Comedy, Mo'Nique rules the stage as host of the 3rd installment in Shaquille O'Neal's All Star Comedy Jam concert series. Filmed in front of a live audience during the 2010 NBA All-Star Weekend in Dallas Texas, comedy queen Mo'Nique leads ... her court with some of the industry's most talented and sought after comedians. No topic is off limits on this night at AEG's Nokia Theatre stage. Seasoned comedians, Paul Mooney, Corey Holcomb, George Willborn and Michael Blackson deliver side busting, non-stop laughs in this energetic and memorable night of comedy.
results.title: All Star Comedy Jam: Live from Dallas
